item.title: ngolimi?
item.description: ngolimi … is Zulu for through language. And what would be more logical for an Iranian computational linguist and a German language technology manager, both living in French-speaking Switzerland, than to choose a Zulu name for their nonprofit project? What we do Language technology consultancy for NGOs, large and small Maybe that’s the ngo in ngolimi ? From strategy to implementation â€” we want to help you communicate with your audiences in the languages they actually speak.
